name: Wall-crawler
effects: Can climb on ceilings and walls as easily as it moves on the ground.

name: Scuttle
effects: Can turn its own failed disengage check into a success by taking 1d4 damage.

name: Durable
effects: The first time each round the MONSTER_NAME takes damage, prevent 2d6 of it.

name: Savage
effects: MONSTER_NAME gains a +2 attack bonus against staggered enemies.

name: Blood frenzy
effects: MONSTER_NAME crit range expands to 16+ while the escalation die is 4+

name: Flows where it likes
effects: MONSTER_NAME is immune to opportunity attacks.

name: Unstoppable
effects: When MONSTER_NAME drops to 0 hp, it does not immediately die. Ignore any damage in excess of 0 hp, roll 2d6, and give the MONSTER_NAME that many temporary hit points. No other healing can affect the MONSTER_NAME or give it more temporary hit points: when the temporary hp are gone, the MONSTER_NAME dies.
